title: 1956년 Milliard 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Milliard. 판결일: 1956-12-19. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Credit Acceptance Corporation v. Frances Milliard, as Administratrix of the Estate of George Milliard, and Walter E. Sullivan
**판결일**: 1956-12-19
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 3 A.D.2d 640

## 판결문 요약


Judgment affirmed, with costs. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment of Erie County Court dismissing the complaint on the merits as to defendant Sullivan in an action in conversion.) Present — McCurn, P. J., Vaughan, Kimball, Williams and Bastow, JJ.
...
